reqs:
Basic drawing and painting for Theatre and Film Design. Priority will be given to BFA Design/Production and BA Theatre majors. IF THIS COURSE IS FULL OR BLOCKED PLEASE SIGN UP FOR THE WAITLIST SECTION: THTR 205A - WL1
This is a WAITLIST section for THTR 205A Section 001. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.
courseName: Graphics for Theatre and Film Design - GRAPHICS: T&F D
